meanings.sent1: Her painting looked amateurish, like something a beginner would create.
meanings.sent2: The amateurish performance of the actors made the audience cringe.
meanings.sent3: The chef's attempt at making sushi was so amateurish that it ended up looking like a messy sandwich.
meanings.sent4: His amateurish attempt at fixing the car only made the problem worse.
meanings.sent5: The amateurish drawing of the house lacked detail and perspective.

meanings.sent1: The cake she baked was amateurish, with uneven layers and lopsided frosting.
meanings.sent2: His amateurish attempts at playing the piano were met with laughter from the audience.
meanings.sent3: The magician's amateurish tricks failed to impress the skeptical crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her amateurish sewing skills resulted in a crooked hem and mismatched buttons.
meanings.sent5: The amateurish handling of the situation only made things more chaotic.
